General.Name: ATEME SA
General.Description: ATEME SA, together with its subsidiaries, provides electronic and computer devices and instruments worldwide. The company offers various solutions, such as TITAN Live, a software-based live video compression for the converged headend; TITAN File, a video transcoding software; TITAN Mux, a multi-function software stream processing solution; KYRION CM5000e, an ultra-low latency encoder; TITAN Edge encoder; TITAN Edge decoder; TITAN Edge gateway; and KYRION DR5000, an ultra-low latency integrated receiver decoder. It also provides NEA-CDN, an OTT scale service solution; NEA-DVR; NEA-Live for immersive viewing experience; NEA-Composer, a dynamic Ad insertion and linear origination solution; PILOT Media, a cloud native media supply chain solution; and PILOT Manager, a cloud native management system. The company serves content providers, service providers, and streaming platforms. ATEME SA was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Vélizy-Villacoublay, France.
